Class LocList

java.lang.Object
  LocList

public class LocList
extends Object

Holds ArrayList, useful for saying "here are all the points that have moveable blots" Has no privacy, is just for convenience (for testing routines) Might want to have info about how many are on each of those points, someday. Might want to not be integer but some kind of "Loc" class. Hmmm, not thread safe?? But doesn't currently allowing changing?

Version:
(2012 Jan 30)
Author:
(Mike Roam)
